about.headline: About me
about.introductionText:
A good friend noticed my passion for all things tech and pushed me to give coding a shot – turns out, solving problems with code feels like working on a never-ending puzzle, and I love it. The constant evolution in tech keeps me curious and challenged every single day.

Let’s connect and create something amazing together!
about.locationText: Based in Baden-Württemberg – I'm open to remote work, but not looking to relocate.
about.learningText: I'm always curious to explore new technologies and love pushing my skills to the next level.
about.solvingText: When tackling problems, I usually start by experimenting and refining my approach. While I often work analytically on my own, I’m always open to collaborating with others when a challenge goes beyond my skill set. I believe in a mix of planning and hands-on problem solving to find the most effective solutions.

skills.headline: Skills
skills.description: I have gained valuable experience working on a variety of projects using modern front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I’m always open to learning and adapting to new tools and frameworks. I believe that continuous learning is key to keeping up with the fast-paced world of web development.
skills.followup: I'm always eager to explore new technologies and frameworks to expand my capabilities.

contact.headline: Contact
contact.introText: I'm excited to bring value to your projects through my work—feel free to reach out if you're looking for a dedicated team member, especially in a front-end or creative development role.
